sections.heading: State constitutes one district.Section 1-3-2 - Repealed.
sections.text:
1-3-1. State constitutes one district.

Pursuant to the 1991 congressional reapportionment, the State of South Dakota, in its entirety, constitutes one congressional district.

Source:SDC 1939, ยง55.0301; SL 1965, ch 227, ยง1; SL 1971, ch 2, ยง1; SL 1981, ch 1; SL 1991, ch 1, ยง1.
